summary: This document is a Bureau of Prisons (BOP) daily log from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York for August 9, 2019. It records inmate movements, status changes (including bail/bond and release), and transfers within the facility. The log shows activity for inmate register number 79951-054, who was released on that date.

events.title: Inmate Release from MCC New York
events.description: An inmate with register number 79951-054 was released from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York.

events.title: Bail/Bond Processing at MCC New York
events.description: Multiple entries in the log indicate bail/bond processing activities for inmates, including movements to and from the R01-001L location (likely a booking or release area).

events.title: Inmate Hospitalization
events.description: An inmate with register number 86627-054 was transferred to an outside hospital (L HOSP USM) and later returned to the facility.

locations: L HOSP USM (likely an outside hospital used by the US Marshals)
keyFacts: This is a Bureau of Prisons internal facility log from the MCC in New York dated August 9, 2019.
The log tracks inmate movements, status changes (admission changes, bail/bond, release), and transfers between housing units and other locations.
A specific inmate (REG NO 79951-054) was released from the facility on this date.
The log uses BOP coding systems for locations (e.g., R01-001L, G10-77BL, E09-568u) and actions (e.g., BAIL/BOND, RELEASE, ADM CHANGE, TRTY TRANS).
The document is part of the discovery materials (EFTA series) from the Southern District of New York (SDNY) case.
